New Records: India scored the highest innings score in a T20 World Cup final with 176 runs for 8 wickets
Jasprit Bumrah conceded only 6 runs in the 16th and 18th overs
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav's mind-boggling catch to dismiss David Miller
Post-Match Reflections: Proteas captain Aiden Markram expressed pride in the team's performance despite the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Proteas had a strong position but failed to capitalize
The game was on par with major rugby finals
